content.summary: MBA candidate from IIM Rohtak with a BBA(MS) degree from International Institute of Professional Studies, Indore. Has experience in Business Development and Content Internship roles. Involved in various academic projects and initiatives, including developing a strategic business plan for a pet-friendly café and organizing events at IIM Rohtak. Achievements include Academic Excellence Award and top rankings in school and college competitions.

experience.title: Business Developer
responsibilities: Implemented an inventory system to increase sales and customer loyalty.
Established a 5-stage process for efficient inventory management.
Improved customer retention by 75% through efficient inventory practices.
Contributed to a 3–5% increase in sales.

experience.title: Content Intern
responsibilities: Developed 10+ practice booklets and reviewed 200+ test papers.
Organized 5 interactive boot camps and student events.
Trained more than 50 candidates for interviews.

projects.title: Pet-friendly Café Business Idea
projects.institution: International Institute of Professional Studies, DAVV
projects.objectives: Formulated a strategic business plan for maximizing growth and integrating all functional areas.
projects.contributions: Developed a proof of concept for the café by setting up a stall on our college campus.

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: High academic performance with a consistent track record.
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Demonstrated initiative and self-learning through personal projects, internships, and certifications.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Showcased teamwork and leadership traits through roles in Business Development, academic projects, and extra-curricular activities.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effective communication skills are implied through various projects and interactions.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Achievements such as Academic Excellence Award and top rankings in competitions highlight standout traits.
